author: USA TODAY, Kim Hjelmgaard, USA TODAY
title: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson 'responding to treatment' for coronavirus
description: Boris Johnson was diagnosed with COVID-19 on March 26 and still had a cough and fever 10 days later. He remains in intensive care.
content:
United Kingdom Prime Minister Boris Johnson has been moved to intensive care at St. Thomas' Hospital in London, England due to COVID-19.
USA TODAY
